content.d: Ah, right, right! Sorry, sorry! Hey, can I talk to you about something?
You know that play Shizuku-chan and the others are doing about angels and fallen angels?

You know, the story where Shizuku-chan, the leader of the army of angels, and fallen angel Yohane were actually best friends in heaven! I saw the script, and it’s soooooo interesting! And it even had a cliffhanger ending! So, I want a role too. But I can’t decide if I want to be on the side of the angels or the fallen angels. It’s so tough.
So, I was wondering if there’s another role we could create other than the angels and fallen angels, and I thought Yohane-chan would know best! You’re the expert, right?
The expert...? Well, I guess so! If that’s the case, then asking fallen angel Yohane is your best choice.
I knew it! Do you have any good ideas?

Yohane isn’t really into plays or anything, but if you really want to create a role, I’ll help you. Let’s see... I’ve heard of a place called Purgatory that’s between Heaven and Hell... How about something like that?
Whaaaaat!? There’s a middle ground!? That’s amazing! I want to play a character from there! I’m gonna get Shizuku-chan and Umi-chan so we can discuss it!
